title: Kwiatkowski Wins on Spain’s White Roads, Bernal Crashes, Unlucky McNulty Punctures Late
content:
UPDATE: Bernal transported to local hospital. Kwiatkowski hangs on after McNulty punctures with 15km to go to win across Spain's 'Mar de Olivos.'

Read the full article at Kwiatkowski Wins on Spain’s White Roads, Bernal Crashes, Unlucky McNulty Punctures Late on Velo.
author: ahood
